name: Re-Role
description:
Life is not always what you expect. 

Your role in life may not be what you want but it sure is what you get.

Events and situations can come at you randomly and you must prepare to gather your stuff and leave at a moment's notice. 

Controls:

WASD - Player Movement

Mouse - Camera

Left Mouse Button - Interact

P - Pause game

Creator Credits:

Tech Artist/Programmer - Anna Hardy

Composer - Noah Wuollet

Programmer - MaKayla Elder

2D Animator/UI Artist - Naomi Chandran

Narrative Designer/3D Artist -  Hannah Sherwood

Some assets are used from Low Poly House Interiors by JustCreate on the UEMarketplace
